paper_keywords: weakly additive ordinal degree of belief
paper_abstract: We consider binary relations <= admitting a conditional measure of uncertainty phi (precisely plausibility, possibility and their dual functions), which locally represents <=: for every pair A <= B, the measure phi(.\C) almost represents for any hypothesis C D A V B, and represents <= under the most specific hypothesis C = A V B. (C) 2007 Published by Elsevier Inc.
paper_title: A view on conditional measures through local representability of binary relations
